content.rendered:
Red Rose Heritage Rice serves you the purpose of everyday meals as well as special feasts. It is best appropriate for people who like curries with their rice like Rajma & Kadhi or any other in particular.
A perfect companion for your everyday and festive cooking requirements. The lustrous grains are meticulously grown and aged to perfection. Their thin shape distinguishes them from the other basmati grains in the competition.
Grown & harvested in the foothills of the Himalayas in the Indian subcontinent, this rice is full of essential vitamins & nutrients that will make your meal healthy along with a delectable taste. Organically matured for at least two years for better quantity, fluffiness & yield. The aging process also delivers the unique Basmati aroma & taste to the rice.
All Sona Cereal products are produced following international quality standards, cleaned, sorted & packed in supreme, hygienic & state-of-the-art facilities, without coming in contact with the human touch.

  • Suitable for everyday cooking
  • Best tastes with curries & side dishes
  • Distinct flavor & aroma
  • Grains elongate twice the size on being cooked
  • Slender long grains that do not break while cooking
